entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023
